info.desc: I can analyze problems, break them down into smaller subproblems, and find effective solutions
In programming, it is important to be attentive to details, as a small mistake can lead to serious problems
The ability to find solutions to complex problems and fix errors in code.
Programmers often face difficulties, and it is important to be able to continue to look for solutions, even if they are not obvious
I can think outside the box and come up with innovative solutions
Many projects require collaboration with other developers, designers, and stakeholders, so it is important to be able to work in a team
The ability to see the "big picture" and understand how the different parts of the system interact with each other
Technologies and programming languages ​​are constantly changing, so it is important to be ready to constantly learn and adapt
Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical people and work with various stakeholders

Ability to effectively manage your time and prioritize, especially when working on multiple projects at once. These qualities will help a programmer not only cope with current tasks, but also develop in the profession

Experience in developing web applications using the following technologies: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, TypeScript, C Sharp, Sass, Git, Node.js, NestJS, Next.js, Event Loop, RESTful, PostgreSQL, Prisma, OAuth, JWT strategy, Webpack, SSR, SPA, Endpoints, Esint, Figma, Tailwind. In this application I have implemented most of the technologies listed above

Experience in developing 2D and 3D applications on the Unity engine for mobile devices and PCs; WebGL platform; implementing saves (indexedDB, on the server, File.IO, localStorage, PlayerPrefs); writing plugins in JS; shaders; URP; project optimization; procedural level generation; 3D modeling in Blender; UniTask; I apply the principles of SOLID, KISS
I am very interested in developing web applications and games on Unity. I often code until late at night. I enjoy applying new knowledge in practice and developing my projects
Technologies are constantly changing, but that's okay! I carefully study the documentation and choose the most modern and optimal options for solving problems
I have clear goals in life and I am ready to do everything to achieve them
I am motivated to cope with difficulties and find solutions
I understand the importance of teamwork and I enjoy working with a team

I want to be involved in the creation of technologies that will be useful to society and people. For example, web applications are used everywhere: from food delivery to financial transactions. And games allow people to relax and gain strength
